attributes.action: I want a vote to stop the increase of fluoride in the water supply.
attributes.additional_details: Because fluoride is toxic and dangerous and no amount is 'safe', when you consider the long to life-time consumption of the substance.
attributes.background: Fluoride is dangerous. The public was never asked for permission to add yet more of it to the water supply. Will the government please, not only inform the people of the decision but ask for permission first via some sort of vote/referendum.
